metadata.title: CVE-2014-8148 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The default D-Bus access control rule in Midgard2 10.05.7.1 allows localusers to send arbitrary method calls or signals to any process on thesystem bus and possibly execute arbitrary code with root privileges.

criterions.comment: midgard2-core package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
